channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US Mint in Philadelphia presses final pennies as the 1-cent coin gets canceled
item.description: The U.S. Mint has ended production of the penny, a change made to save money and in recognition of the growing irrelevance of the 1-cent coin

item.title: Search for trapped worker inside a West Virginia coal mine is a rescue operation, governor says
item.description: West Virginia's governor says the search for a trapped worker inside a flooded coal mine remains a rescue operation

item.title: Former officer pleads guilty to mistreating prisoner paralyzed in Connecticut police van
item.description: A former Connecticut police officer has pleaded guilty to mistreating prisoner Richard “Randy” Cox after he was paralyzed in a police van

item.title: Montana man convicted of murder in campsite killing
item.description: A jury has found a man with links to white supremacists guilty of murder in a brutal killing at a southwestern Montana campsite

item.title: Solution goes on auction for CIA HQ's 'Kryptos' sculpture that has stumped code breakers for decades
item.description: An artist is auctioning off his archive for a sculpture at CIA headquarters that has transfixed code breakers for decades
